Properties

IsNonNvidiaAdapter

True when the path represents a non-NVIDIA adapter.

public bool IsNonNvidiaAdapter { get; }

Property Value

bool

OsAdapterLuid

OS adapter LUID value for non-NVIDIA adapters, or null if not present.
